articles.title: Police searching Brown University after shooter kills 2 and wounds 8 on campus
articles.description:
Authorities believe the shooter used a handgun, according to a law enforcement official who was not authorized to discuss an ongoing investigation and spoke on condition of anonymity.

The post Police searching Brown University after shooter kills 2 and wounds 8 on campus appeared first on Boston.com.
